raw_data.diagnosis_description: CCL rupture - claimed as sudden injury
raw_data.treatment_notes: Dog presented with rear leg lameness. Owner claims sudden onset from jumping. CCL rupture diagnosed. NOTE: Pet has documented pre-existing hip dysplasia.

agent.reasoning: This claim must be quarantined due to multiple critical validation failures: 1) Policy POL-DEMO-001 not found in system (404 error), making coverage verification impossible, 2) Provider "Sunny Valley Vet Clinic" not found in database, raising authenticity concerns, 3) Claim amount ($1,600) is significantly below typical CCL treatment cost range ($3,000-$6,000), suggesting incomplete treatment or potential fraud, 4) Treatment notes mention pre-existing hip dysplasia which could be related to CCL injury and affect coverage. While data structure and diagnosis code are valid, these fundamental issues require human review before processing can continue.
